fields.title: Explosion Resistance
fields.description: Sets the explosion resistance for the block. Greater values result in greater resistance to explosions. The scale will be different for different explosion power levels. A negative value or 0 means it will easily explode; larger numbers increase level of resistance.

description: Sets the block's resistance to explosions from TNT, creepers, and other sources. Higher values make blocks harder to destroyâ€”bedrock has near-infinite resistance while glass shatters easily. Configure appropriate resistance to match the block's intended durability in survival gameplay.
